nodes.text: Eaba N'Wan was a male Sullustan who worked for the SoroSuub Corporation during the time of the Clone Wars. He secretly stole copies of the Corporations's designs for the MMR-9 recovery droid and gave them to the Fireclaw Horde, a Togorian criminal gang. He subsequently traveled to the Horde's hideout on the planet Genarius, and assisted the gang by helping create a modified version of the MMR-9, to use for attacking starships.
